authors: nfdi4plants, Lukas Weil, Kevin Frey, Kevin Schneider, Oliver Maus
description: ARC and ISA compliant experimental metadata toolkit in F#. This project is meant as an easy means to open, manipulate and save ISA (Investigation,Study,Assay) metadata files in the dotnet environment.
